GAME_INTRO.message: This is the start of the story. Please enter 'start' to begin.

onestart.message:
While living your own life is a choice that we each make, making a difference in someone else's isn't. 
 You're an overworked software engineer. It's been weeks since a good night's sleep. You can't wait to get home and enjoy the weekend. 
 The last minute before the building closes a coworker comes and asks you a favor. 
 'I'm swamped with work and I could really use your help tomorrow. Can you help?'

1goodending.message:
'How are you doing? Hope you have a wonderful day!' And they did. 
 You would have no idea how impactful your greeting was.

1bad ending.message: You didn't say anything. And it would remain that way. You would have no idea how impactful your silence would have.

1badending.message: You didn't say anything. And it would remain that way. You would have no idea how impactful your silence would have.

threestart.message: In this game, you would play as the ignored, lonely coworker
